name: UFO Destroyer
description:
Description

UFO Destroyer is a simple point-and-click modern whack-a-molish type of game. The primary objective is to send as many UFOs as possible to oblivion before they do the same to you. Get as many points as possible.

Credits

  • Nicholas Nathaniel (Project Manager)
  • Natannael (Game Designer)
  • Kensi Chandrawan (Programmer)
  • Jerry (2D Artist)
  • Justin Admaja (2D Artist)
  • Yehezkiel Salvator Christanto (Sound Engineer)
  • Javin (Project Supervisor)
